articles.title: Soccer-Messi to lead Argentina in friendly against Australia in China
articles.description: (Changes media identifier, adds background, fan reaction) BEIJING, May 22 (Reuters) - Argentina captain Lionel Messi will lead his side against Australia in a friendly in Beijing next month with his first visit to China in six years set to spark a mass scramble for tickets.

articles.title: Australia’s Socceroos locked in for rematch with World Cup winner Argentina in China
articles.description: The Socceroos will take on world champions Argentina in a friendly match in Beijing on June 15, six months after they faced off at the World Cup.
articles.content:
The Socceroos will face world champions Argentina in Beijing on June 15 in crucial preparation for their Asian Cup tilt and World Cup qualifying.
The long-rumoured friendly clash at the newly-renovated Workers’ Stadium is to go ahead, just over six m... [1832 chars]

articles.title: Humongous, 100-foot-long dinosaur from Argentina is so big its fossils broke the road during transport
articles.description: About 90 million years ago, a ginormous long-necked dinosaur measuring nearly 100 feet (30 meters) long lumbered through what is now Patagonia, Argentina.
articles.content:
The newly described mid-Cretaceous dinosaur Chucarosaurus diripienda was likely about 100 feet (30 meters) long. (Image credit: Sebastián Rozadilla)

articles.description: Argentinian fan Lauti was willing to sell his car in order to pay for flights and a ticket to watch Coventry City at Wembley next weekend, but Tom Grennan has stepped in to cover all expenses
